body:
Hello Avicus Community,

I just want to say something I wanted to do, I want to make a YouTube Channel  that has Tips & Tricks for Nebula mostly, but give me your opinions!(Yes or No), (And if someone did this kind of channel for Tips & Tricks for nebula already let me know too). :D
body_tagged:

I just want to say something I wanted to do, I want to make a YouTube Channel  that has Tips & Tricks for Nebula mostly, but give me your opinions!(Yes or No), (And if someone did this kind of channel for Tips & Tricks for nebula already let me know too). :D
title: [YouTube] I need your advice!

replies.body:
It's your choice.

If you do get big, make sure to record on Avicus so that we get more players. :)
Good luck!
replies.body_tagged:
It's your choice.

If you do get big, make sure to record on Avicus so that we get more players. :)
Good luck!

replies.body:
Tips and tricks for PvP in general, and even the whole of Minecraft would be pretty cool. I was also thinking of making a tips and tricks video. Definitely go for it, I'd like to see how it progresses!

Just make sure you keep things informational and interesting at the same time, without making it boring, long, and unnecessarily info-packed. Keep things short and sweet. I wouldn't want to watch 27 minutes of you doing the same thing over and over again, right? C:
replies.body_tagged:
